dmca.title: Fwd: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd. - Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, November 29, 2004 10:11 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd. - Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Jagex Copyright <ipagent@jagex.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Wednesday, November 24, 2004, 5:07:14 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd. - Copyright Infringement

===8<==============Original message text===============
To whom it may concern,

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am
authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the intellectual property
rights. I have a good faith belief that the use of the material
identified below has not been authorized by the owner, its agents or the
law. Please promptly remove the infringing material or disable access to
it.

Name of the Intellectual Property Owner: Jagex Limited
Name and/or Description of the Infringed Work or Right: The software program
SCAR aswell as several references to the RuneScape name, copyright of Jagex
Ltd. 2002

Description of the Infringing Material: Download offerings of SCAR
(various versions)
available from website(s) listed below.

Location of the Infringing Material:

http://www.freerunescapeprograms.com/files/SCAR1.13.exe

Date: 24th November 2004

I can be contacted at:

Name: Chris Endicott
Title: Customer Support Team member
Company: Jagex Limited
Street Address: St Johns Innovation Centre
City: Cambridge
State: England
Zip: CB4 0WS

Telephone: 08707657346
Email: chris.endicott@jagex.com

I certify under penalty of perjury the truth of the above information.

Regards

Chris Endicott
Jagex Ltd.


===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBq0lSvK/XpJs6oyURAoE8AJ0ZGkjr8oRfSwLc9a8wlpHW+K4FbACeNpBd
EYiAyUZVB9DEKQJwjs0IX7s=
=5oe9
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
